p.k: Klischee is one of Switzerland's most in-demand live acts. Although it started out as a studio project, this band soon transformed into a stage favorite, incorporating a variety of genres - from funk and disco to house and blues - in its music.
p.d: Since its opening in 1992, jazz club Moods has developed into one of Zurich's largest and most prominent cultural venues. At the same time, it has become one of Europe's prominent jazz clubs which today enjoys a well-deserved worldwide reputation among musicians and critics. The venue books a large variety of genres, ranging from jazz and soul to electronic and international music. Klischee is one of Switzerland's most in-demand live acts. Although it started out as a studio project, the band soon transformed into a stage favorite, incorporating a variety of genres - from funk and disco to house and blues - in its music.
